bayStackUnicastStormControlMib.name: bayStackUnicastStormControlMib
bayStackUnicastStormControlMib.description: This MIB module is used for ARP inspection configuration settings in Nortel's software and products.

bsUnicastStormControlEnabled.name: bsUnicastStormControlEnabled
bsUnicastStormControlEnabled.description: Indicates whether unicast storm control is enabled.

bsUnicastStormControlLowWatermark.name: bsUnicastStormControlLowWatermark
bsUnicastStormControlLowWatermark.description: Low watermark for unicast storm control. If the rate drops below this value after having risen above the high watermark, a single notification will be generated.

bsUnicastStormControlHighWatermark.name: bsUnicastStormControlHighWatermark
bsUnicastStormControlHighWatermark.description: High watermark for unicast storm control. If the rate rises above this value, notifications will be generated at the rate give by the bsUnicastStormControlTrapInterval object.

bsUnicastStormControlPollInterval.name: bsUnicastStormControlPollInterval
bsUnicastStormControlPollInterval.description: The polling interval for checking the packet rate for unicast storm control.

bsUnicastStormControlTrapInterval.name: bsUnicastStormControlTrapInterval
bsUnicastStormControlTrapInterval.description: The rate for sending unicast storm control notifications.

bsUnicastStormControlPollValue.name: bsUnicastStormControlPollValue
bsUnicastStormControlPollValue.description: The polled value when a notification is generated.

bsUnicastStormControlIfTable.name: bsUnicastStormControlIfTable
bsUnicastStormControlIfTable.description: This table is used to control unicast storm control settings per-interface.

bsUnicastStormControlIfEntry.name: bsUnicastStormControlIfEntry
bsUnicastStormControlIfEntry.description: An entry containing objects for controlling unicast storm control settings for an interface.

bsUnicastStormControlIfIndex.name: bsUnicastStormControlIfIndex
bsUnicastStormControlIfIndex.description: The ifIndex value of the interface.

bsUnicastStormControlIfEnabled.name: bsUnicastStormControlIfEnabled
bsUnicastStormControlIfEnabled.description: Indicates whether unicast storm control is enabled for this interface.

bsUnicastStormControlBelowLowWatermark.name: bsUnicastStormControlBelowLowWatermark
bsUnicastStormControlBelowLowWatermark.description: This notification is generated when the unicast storm control packet rate falls below the low watermark after having risen above the high watermark. It is generated only once when this occurs.

bsUnicastStormControlAboveHighWatermark.name: bsUnicastStormControlAboveHighWatermark
bsUnicastStormControlAboveHighWatermark.description: This notification is generated periodically as long as the unicast storm control packet rate remains above the high watermark.
